name: places/ChIJAQDweZ1YwokRp8ajEVs3Cs4
formattedAddress: 700 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 700 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I ordered 3 items. Only 2 shipped, and the other one lost. I called and left messages, no one to talk to and no one will call you back. You can't do a claim on the item. I sent an email, but they won't even try to help. I'm out of $75 and a gift. I WOULD NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!!

originalText.text: Stay away from this site. Don't say you're were not ⚠️ warned.   This is a scam website selling dollar store items for large sums of your money.  The items I bought were nowhere close to those advertised.  When you try to return the items, they charge you a 30% restocking fee and $5 for shipping in addition to your shipping cost.  Stay away from this scaming seller.

originalText.text: I order a dog tag for my son as a gift for his birthday about a week ago. I have not received any updates on the delivery process. Every time I contact the phone number in the website it keeps saying their representatives are busy and to leave a message with the order number; which I have done twice so far. I have also sent them two emails but have not received a response as of yet. I don’t understand why I haven’t received a response or any updates on the item I ordered. I will update another review whether I have received my order or not.

originalText.text: I ordered a dog tag Sept. 2, 2022 and still have not received it. I emailed them twice only to get a very vague generic answer. I’m skeptical about this company. Their website says 2-3 days for production and 2-5 days for shipping. I think we’re well past that point. I will update if I actually receive the product I purchased.

originalText.text: I haven't heard from them. I ordered a dog tag. Worst for communication. I am filing a PayPal dispute now. I would NEVER recommend doing business with them.
